README for Colossus SmallTitan Variant

What is SmallTitan ?

SmallTitan is a variant that uses a smaller MasterBoard, allowing only three players. It was designed to help debug the code :-)

File Version

$$

Last modified: Tue May 7 14:47:06 MET DST 2002

<?xml version="1.0"?> <!-- towi: giving the file-path to the dtd would not be neccessary if the RecourceLoader would not return a InputStream, but a url to the xml file to load. that could then passed to the SAXBuilder and it could resolve relative URIs. hmm, but the recource loader is a fine thing... --> <battlemap terrain="Brush" tower="False"> <battlehex x="0" y="2" terrain="Brambles" elevation="0"> </battlehex> <battlehex x="1" y="3" terrain="Brambles" elevation="0"> </battlehex> <battlehex x="2" y="2" terrain="Brambles" elevation="0"> </battlehex> <battlehex x="3" y="1" terrain="Brambles" elevation="0"> </battlehex> <battlehex x="3" y="4" terrain="Brambles" elevation="0"> </battlehex> <battlehex x="3" y="5" terrain="Brambles" elevation="0"> </battlehex> <battlehex x="4" y="3" terrain="Brambles" elevation="0"> </battlehex> <battlehex x="5" y="1" terrain="Brambles" elevation="0"> </battlehex> </battlemap>
